results.content:
I've bought many courses here at Udemy and tried to learn the intended technology but none of them really helped me understand the thing I wanted to understand. It seemed impossible to grasp and I really lost hope in those and left in the middle. But with this course it's totally different, finally I also can build my own module and the learning process is pretty straight forward, easy to follow and completely related to real world scenario. 

Jan is an awesome teacher and really responsive to answer any questions and solve problems. I've had an amazing experience with him while he was answering my questions, in fact saved my day :)

I wish to enroll on more courses that Jan releases in the future and recommend this course to everyone willing to up their game, truly.

response.content: Thanks so much. I appreciate your kind words and are happy I was able to help you with your problem, which also resulted in a new lesson for the course :)
response.content_html: Thanks so much. I appreciate your kind words and are happy I was able to help you with your problem, which also resulted in a new lesson for the course :)

results.content:
This is a very detailed course and was great at giving me a head start with Divi Modules. I have a much better understanding of how it works, and hope with time Jan will keep improving it and keep it updated.

Thank you for all your hard work! It's very appreciated.

Adnan

results.content:
First of all thank you to divi dojo team what lovely and great course created.In this course each and every thing explain about modules in depth and lovely support if any query really you rock with this course.
All my queries is solved. Also seen your product all are really great.
This is better documentation/course  compare to elegant theme.
I really recommended to all divi developer buy and watch this course.it's really helpful.
Again Thank you to Team.

response.content: Thanks Niki and I wish you all the best with your business. You can always count on me. To everybody reading this, Niki had a problem in his module due to a bug in Elegant Themes core code but luckily we were able to figure out a good solution and he was able to continue to develop his module.

results.content:
This course was really helpful to me. The instructor explains complicated things in a way that is easy to understand. And even though English is not his first language, I found it to be no problem whatsoever because Jan speaks English very well.

All in all I'm happy with my purchase.
